article.title: Welcome to the New Hampshire U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about the New Hampshire U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​

The U.S. Department of Commerce, U.S. Commercial Service, is a federal government agency dedicated to helping small and medium sized companies develop international markets.

TheNew Hampshire Export Assistance Centeris part of an international network of global professionals in 165 offices and 82 countries throughout the world.

Our experienced staff of International Trade Specialists will help you:

  • Identify and evaluate international partners
  • Navigate international documentation challenges
  • Create market entry strategies
  • Other export related guidance

For more information on how we can help your company succeed in the global marketplace, pleasecontact us!​

Visit our new page for export updates!

  • Updates for Exporters
